title: travelplanner: I need assistance in planning a week-long vacation for 2 individuals, starting from Chattanooga and covering 3 cities in Georgia. This trip will span from March 24th to March 30th, 2022, with a budget cap at $6,800. We'll be traveling with our children who are under 10 years old, hence, accommodations must be children-friendly and should ideally be entire rooms. For this trip, we would prefer not to take any flights. (3f5cb0b59f9be595)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: I need assistance in planning a week-long vacation for 2 individuals, starting from Chattanooga and covering 3 cities in Georgia. This trip will span from March 24th to March 30th, 2022, with a budget cap at $6,800. We'll be traveling with our children who are under 10 years old, hence, accommodations must be children-friendly and should ideally be entire rooms. For this trip, we would prefer not to take any flights.

The budget is $6,800. The trip should not include any flights, and accommodations must be children-friendly and entire rooms. Provide details for transportation, breakfast, attractions, lunch, dinner, and accommodation for each day. Ensure the plan is suitable for children."}

chat_history.content:
### Vacation Plan for 2 Adults and Children Under 10 in Georgia (March 24th - March 30th, 2022)

#### Cities to Visit:
1. Augusta
2. Decatur
3. Atlanta

### Day 1: March 24th, 2022 - Chattanooga to Augusta
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Chattanooga to Augusta
  - **Distance**: Approximately 250 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 4 hours
  - **Estimated Cost**: $50 (gas)

- **Accommodation**: Planta Baja Studio
  - **Price**: $637 per night
  - **Type**: Entire home/apt
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 4

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At home before departure
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Augusta

- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit the Augusta Canal Discovery Center
  - Walk around the Riverwalk Augusta

### Day 2: March 25th, 2022 - Augusta
- **Accommodation**: Planta Baja Studio

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café
  - **Lunch**: Family-friendly restaurant
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant

- **Attractions**:
  - Phinizy Swamp Nature Park
  - Morris Museum of Art

### Day 3: March 26th, 2022 - Augusta to Decatur
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Augusta to Decatur
  - **Distance**: Approximately 150 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 2.5 hours
  - **Estimated Cost**: $30 (gas)

- **Accommodation**: Hamilton Hts Beauty, Manhattan 1 BR
  - **Price**: $486 per night
  - **Type**: Entire home/apt
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 4

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café in Augusta
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Decatur

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Fernbank Museum of Natural History
  - Explore the Decatur Square

### Day 4: March 27th, 2022 - Decatur
- **Accommodation**: Hamilton Hts Beauty, Manhattan 1 BR

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café
  - **Lunch**: Family-friendly restaurant
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Decatur Toy Park
  - Walk around the Oakhurst Park

### Day 5: March 28th, 2022 - Decatur to Atlanta
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Decatur to Atlanta
  - **Distance**: Approximately 10 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 20 minutes
  - **Estimated Cost**: $5 (gas)

- **Accommodation**: Charming Carroll Gardens 2 BR
  - **Price**: $576 per night
  - **Type**: Entire home/apt
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 4

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café in Decatur
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Atlanta

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Georgia Aquarium
  - Walk around Centennial Olympic Park

### Day 6: March 29th, 2022 - Atlanta
- **Accommodation**: Charming Carroll Gardens 2 BR

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café
  - **Lunch**: Family-friendly restaurant
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Children's Museum of Atlanta
  - Explore the Atlanta Botanical Garden

### Day 7: March 30th, 2022 - Atlanta to Chattanooga
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Atlanta to Chattanooga
  - **Distance**: Approximately 120 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 2 hours
  - **Estimated Cost**: $25 (gas)

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café in Atlanta
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: At home in Chattanooga

### Budget Breakdown:
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Augusta: $637 x 2 nights = $1,274
  - Decatur: $486 x 2 nights = $972
  - Atlanta: $576 x 2 nights = $1,152
  - **Total Accommodation**: $3,398

- **Transportation**: 
  - Gas: $110

- **Meals**: 
  - Estimated $100 per day for 7 days = $700

- **Attractions**: 
  - Estimated $50 per day for 7 days = $350

- **Total Estimated Cost**: $4,558

This plan leaves room in the budget for additional activities, souvenirs, and any unexpected expenses.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.content:
### Vacation Plan for 2 Adults and Children Under 10 in Georgia (March 24th - March 30th, 2022)

#### Cities to Visit:
1. Augusta
2. Decatur
3. Atlanta

### Day 1: March 24th, 2022 - Chattanooga to Augusta
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Chattanooga to Augusta
  - **Distance**: Approximately 250 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 4 hours
  - **Estimated Cost**: $50 (gas)

- **Accommodation**: Planta Baja Studio
  - **Price**: $637 per night
  - **Type**: Entire home/apt
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 4

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: At home before departure
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Augusta

- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit the Augusta Canal Discovery Center
  - Walk around the Riverwalk Augusta

### Day 2: March 25th, 2022 - Augusta
- **Accommodation**: Planta Baja Studio

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café
  - **Lunch**: Family-friendly restaurant
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant

- **Attractions**:
  - Phinizy Swamp Nature Park
  - Morris Museum of Art

### Day 3: March 26th, 2022 - Augusta to Decatur
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Augusta to Decatur
  - **Distance**: Approximately 150 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 2.5 hours
  - **Estimated Cost**: $30 (gas)

- **Accommodation**: Hamilton Hts Beauty, Manhattan 1 BR
  - **Price**: $486 per night
  - **Type**: Entire home/apt
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 4

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café in Augusta
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Decatur

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Fernbank Museum of Natural History
  - Explore the Decatur Square

### Day 4: March 27th, 2022 - Decatur
- **Accommodation**: Hamilton Hts Beauty, Manhattan 1 BR

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café
  - **Lunch**: Family-friendly restaurant
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Decatur Toy Park
  - Walk around the Oakhurst Park

### Day 5: March 28th, 2022 - Decatur to Atlanta
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Decatur to Atlanta
  - **Distance**: Approximately 10 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 20 minutes
  - **Estimated Cost**: $5 (gas)

- **Accommodation**: Charming Carroll Gardens 2 BR
  - **Price**: $576 per night
  - **Type**: Entire home/apt
  - **Maximum Occupancy**: 4

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café in Decatur
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant in Atlanta

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Georgia Aquarium
  - Walk around Centennial Olympic Park

### Day 6: March 29th, 2022 - Atlanta
- **Accommodation**: Charming Carroll Gardens 2 BR

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café
  - **Lunch**: Family-friendly restaurant
  - **Dinner**: Local restaurant

- **Attractions**:
  - Visit the Children's Museum of Atlanta
  - Explore the Atlanta Botanical Garden

### Day 7: March 30th, 2022 - Atlanta to Chattanooga
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Atlanta to Chattanooga
  - **Distance**: Approximately 120 miles
  - **Estimated Time**: 2 hours
  - **Estimated Cost**: $25 (gas)

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Local café in Atlanta
  - **Lunch**: Packed lunch for the road
  - **Dinner**: At home in Chattanooga

### Budget Breakdown:
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Augusta: $637 x 2 nights = $1,274
  - Decatur: $486 x 2 nights = $972
  - Atlanta: $576 x 2 nights = $1,152
  - **Total Accommodation**: $3,398

- **Transportation**: 
  - Gas: $110

- **Meals**: 
  - Estimated $100 per day for 7 days = $700

- **Attractions**: 
  - Estimated $50 per day for 7 days = $350

- **Total Estimated Cost**: $4,558

This plan leaves room in the budget for additional activities, souvenirs, and any unexpected expenses.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
